SENT.plain: Angelman syndrome is often associated with medically refractory epilepsy

Here, we report the case of a young girl with Angelman syndrome who experienced frequent and prolonged atonic seizures associated with dysautonomia and was unresponsive to multiple antiepileptic drugs, but who responded dramatically to the ketogenic diet
Clinicians are encouraged to consider the ketogenic diet early in the treatment course of patients with Angelman syndrome
